amendment.description: To provide for congressional oversight of certain Central Intelligence Agency programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5095 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 256.

action.text: Amendment SA 5095 proposed by Senator Rockefeller. (consideration: CR S10369-10378, S10396-10397; text: CR S10369-10370) To provide for congressional oversight of certain Central Intelligence Agency programs.
